job.title: Lead Site Reliability Engineer (REMOTE)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
If you are a Lead Site Reliability Engineer looking for fully remote work, please read on!
We are a publicly traded, leading industrial technology company with roots in North America and Europe, along with a team of 12k+ employees. We're on a quest to become the #1 company in our sector and are looking for someone to Lead our new SRE Team to build fault tolerant systems and reliable software to help us design, deploy, scale, and maintain highly available distributed sensory networks and companion cloud applications.
What You Will Be Doing
Develop applications from customer services side/liability - that gear towards application transactions and less in application infrastructure
Incident response and problem management towards application development and monitoring
Contribute to a light amount of application development, working very closely with development teams on reliability / observability.
Provide reasoning about application architecture as well as be comfortable looking at code and offering feedback on how it can be improved to increase reliability.
Participate and lead incident resolution efforts and subsequent postmortems.
Work laterally with our other engineering teams to identify root causes, characterize and track problems and collaborate to address them
Defining required performance and expected load, taking actions to address disruptions and monitoring operation.
What You Need for this Position
5+ years working experience using either one: Python, C++, Java, Go, or C#
Good blend of Software Development + Operations (DevOps)
Azure (deploying / operating solutions)
Incident response and problem management
Docker/Kubernetes
Bonus Points For
Experience leading small teams
IoT (Internet of Things) networks
Kubernetes, Terraform
Experience with highly available distributed systems at scale.
What's In It for You
Fully REMOTE
HUGE room for growth
Competitive pay + up to 20% bonus + Generous benefits (Health, Dental, Vision, Life, AD&D, HSA Accounts)
Stock purchase Plans
Healthy work/life balance
So, if you are a Lead Site Reliability Engineer looking for a change - please apply today - INTVs are being scheduled!
Email Your Resume In Word To
